required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Food Effect Study of Anaprazole in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Randomized, Open-labeled, Crossover Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Pharmakinetics Effect of High Fat Food to Single Dose Administration of Anaprazole in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A single-center, randomized, open-labeled, 2×2 crossover phase 1 study to evaluate the pharmakinetics effect of high fat food to single dose administration of Anaprazole in healthy Chinese male subjects. 14 health male subjects is divided to A group (n=7) and B group (n=7). 2 periods (7 days) cross-over design, anaprazole 40mg single dose, one is fasting oral administration before breakfast, the other is oral administration 30 minutes after breakfast with high fat food.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC of anaprazole (parent drug, KBP-3571) and its enantiomer（KBP-3570）and its major metabolites
primary_outcome.description: AUC is area under the plasma concentration-time curve

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax of anaprazole (parent drug, KBP-3571) and its enantiomer（KBP-3570）and its major metabolites
primary_outcome.description: Cmax is the peak plasma concentration

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax of anaprazole (parent drug, KBP-3571) and its enantiomer（KBP-3570）and its major metabolites
primary_outcome.description: Tmax is the time to peak plasma concentration

arm_group.description: Anaprazole 40mg, single dose, oral administration 30 minutes after breakfast with high fat food.
Anaprazole 40mg, single dose, oral administration before breakfast.

intervention.description: single dose, oral administration 30 minutes after breakfast with high fat food.
single dose, oral administration before breakfast.
